prod_long_desc:
Push the LEGO® Friends Amusement Park Roller Coaster around the track, sit a mini-doll in the front carriage to activate the light brick, and activate the cool functions as you go! Turn the Ferris wheel with its swinging gondolas, then push the car to the top of the drop tower and release to watch it go spinning round. This set is full of detailed functions and accessories for a day at the iconic Amusement Park. Includes 4 mini-doll figures.
Build an amusement park featuring a roller coaster with four carriages, drop tower and ferris wheel, plus lots of accessories
Includes 4 mini-doll figures: Emma, Andrea, Matthew and Naya, all in summer outfits
Roller coaster track measures 27" long, coaster train with 4 carriages measures over 1" high, 6" long and 1" wide
LEGO Friends building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The rotating ferris wheel measures over 12" high, 11" wide and 4" long. The drop tower measures over 12" high, 4" wide and 2" long
1124 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 12 years old
